author: ianfQ6364IK
title: Rizt Carlton Battery Park
text: A great hotel in a great location. Not the cheapest place top stay in New York but you definitely get what you pay for. Customer Service right from the moment of arrival to departure is outstanding. The hotel is well placed to walk to ferries to the Statue of Liberty and the World Trade Centre / 911 Museum. Access to the subway is also a very short walk.
